text: "Piece of My Heart" is a song co-written and performed by American contemporary R&B; singer Tara Kemp, issued as the second single from her eponymous debut album. The song was her second consecutive Top 10 hit on the Billboard Hot 100, peaking at #7 in 1991. ==Chart positions== ===Weekly charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (1991) !Peak position |- |US Billboard Hot 100 |align=center|7 |- |US Hot Dance Music/Maxi- Singles Sales (Billboard) |align=center|26 |- |US Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles & Tracks (Billboard) |align=center|47 |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1991) !align="center"|Position |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Hot 100 |align="center"|84 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 songs Category:1991 singles Category:Tara Kemp songs Category:Giant Records (Warner) singles Category:Songs written by Tara Kemp
title: Piece of My Heart (Tara Kemp song)
